title: shoplungu-e-commerce
description: A modern e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.
longDescription: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. Includes user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and a comprehensive admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and customers.

title: Tour & Travel Booking Platform
description: A web platform where users can explore, plan, and book their tours and travel destinations with ease.
longDescription: An interactive tour and travel management system that allows users to browse destinations, customize tour packages, and make bookings online. The platform supports itinerary planning, online payments, and customer reviews, providing a seamless travel experience.
features: Itinerary planning and booking history tracking

title: Advanced Task Manager
description: A full-stack task management application with real-time collaboration, drag-and-drop functionality, and team workspaces.
longDescription: A comprehensive project management solution that combines modern web technologies to create an intuitive and powerful task management experience. Features include real-time collaboration, customizable workflows, and advanced analytics.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for data analysis with real-time charts, filtering capabilities, and export functionality.
longDescription: A comprehensive data visualization tool that transforms complex datasets into interactive, meaningful charts and graphs. Features real-time data updates, advanced filtering options, and multiple export formats for business intelligence needs.

title: AI-Driven Autonomous Research Assistant
description: An AI system designed to autonomously analyze scientific literature, extract structured knowledge, build dynamic knowledge graphs, generate hypotheses, and suggest experimental designs.
longDescription: The AI-Driven Autonomous Research Assistant aims to revolutionize scientific discovery by automating key research processes. The system reads and understands scientific papers, extracts meaningful entities and relationships, constructs dynamic knowledge graphs, and proposes hypotheses and experimental designs based on identified patterns and research gaps. Leveraging a combination of deep learning, symbolic AI, and neuro-symbolic reasoning, this assistant provides explainable insights and accelerates research workflows.
features: Scientific document ingestion and semantic parsing
Named Entity Recognition and Relation Extraction
Pattern analysis and research gap identification

title: Neurosymbolic Programming Framework for Explainable AI Agents
description: A hybrid AI framework combining neural networks with symbolic reasoning to enable transparent and explainable AI decisions.
longDescription: This project integrates deep learning with symbolic logic programming to build AI agents that can perform pattern recognition and logical inference simultaneously. The framework allows AI models to generate reasoning chains alongside predictions, supporting explainable decision-making in sensitive domains like healthcare, law, and finance.
features: Hybrid deep learning and symbolic logic execution
Transparent inference tracing with explainable outputs
Knowledge graph integration for reasoning support
Testable experiments with logical consistency checks
Modular design for plugging into AI agents

title: AI-Powered Chatbot
description: A sophisticated chatbot built with Next.js and OpenAI API, featuring natural language processing and context-aware responses.
longDescription: This project demonstrates the integration of modern web technologies with artificial intelligence. The chatbot uses OpenAI's GPT API to provide intelligent, context-aware responses to user queries. Built with Next.js 15, it features a responsive design, real-time messaging, and conversation history management.
